page.title: 04EDUCATION BRAE
page.content: The Brae school was first opened in 1877 with three teachers and 33 pupils.The school was a junior secondary until 1970 then it became a Junior High School.In 1976 the Primary department moved to a new building.The Secondary department moved to the new site in 1981.In 1985 there were 38 nursery,138 primary and 265 secondary pupils.The Primary has 6 classes and 8 teachers.The Secondary has 19 full-time and 10 part-time teachers There is alot of school transport because many of the pupils live outside the Brae area.This means attendance is poor in bad weather.It also affects after school activities. The school is modern and very well equipped.The pupils treat their school with care and respect.
